alert.note: Alert for Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 15 at 6:52PM EST until December 16 at 2:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Queens County. * WHEN...Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. ROCKAWAY INLET NY NEAR FLOYD BENNETT FIELD NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.3 FT, MODERATE 8.3 FT, MAJOR 9.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/01 AM 6.6/ 7.1 1.0/ 1.5 2.5/ 3.0 5 NONE 16/01 PM 7.2/ 7.7 1.6/ 2.0 2.7/ 3.2 5 MINOR 17/02 AM 4.2/ 4.7 -1.4/-0.9 0.0/ 0.5 4 NONE 17/02 PM 4.0/ 4.5 -1.7/-1.2 -0.3/ 0.2 3 NONE 18/03 AM 4.5/ 5.0 -1.1/-0.7 -0.2/ 0.3 2 NONE 18/03 PM 4.2/ 4.7 -1.5/-1.0 -0.2/ 0.3 2 NONE JAMAICA BAY AT INWOOD NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.5 FT, MODERATE 8.2 FT, MAJOR 9.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 3.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/02 AM 6.9/ 7.4 1.0/ 1.5 2.5/ 3.0 0 NONE 16/12 PM 7.1/ 7.6 1.2/ 1.7 3.0/ 3.5 0 NONE 17/01 AM 4.7/ 5.2 -1.1/-0.7 0.8/ 1.3 0 NONE 17/03 PM 4.5/ 5.0 -1.5/-1.0 -0.2/ 0.2 0 NONE 18/04 AM 5.0/ 5.5 -1.0/-0.5 0.0/ 0.5 0 NONE 18/04 PM 4.6/ 5.1 -1.4/-0.9 -0.2/ 0.3 0 NONE EAST ROCKAWAY INLET AT ATLANTIC BEACH NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 6.0 FT, MODERATE 7.0 FT, MAJOR 8.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.0 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 3.0 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/02 AM 5.7/ 6.2 0.7/ 1.1 2.2/ 2.7 7-8 NONE 16/01 PM 6.1/ 6.6 1.1/ 1.6 2.3/ 2.8 7-8 MINOR 17/01 AM 4.2/ 4.7 -0.8/-0.2 0.6/ 1.1 5 NONE 17/02 PM 3.5/ 4.0 -1.6/-1.1 -0.2/ 0.2 3 NONE 18/03 AM 4.0/ 4.5 -1.0/-0.5 -0.2/ 0.3 3 NONE 18/03 PM 3.5/ 4.0 -1.6/-1.1 -0.2/ 0.3 2 NONE &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
